name: Combobox
description: A text input with an associated popup that enables users to select a value or enter a custom value. Supports autocomplete, filtering, multiselect, and freeform input.

props.name: freeform
props.description: Allow custom user input beyond provided options

props.name: children
props.description: The option elements to render in the dropdown

props.name: appearance
props.description: Controls the colors and borders of the combobox trigger

props.name: clearable
props.description: If set, the combobox will show an icon to clear the current value

props.name: defaultOpen
props.description: The default open state when open is uncontrolled

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value displayed in the trigger input when uncontrolled

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disable the combobox

props.name: inlinePopup
props.description: Render the combobox's popup inline in the DOM

props.name: multiselect
props.description: Enable selection of multiple options

props.name: open
props.description: Controls the open state of the dropdown

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text for the input

props.name: size
props.description: Size of the combobox

props.name: value
props.description: The controlled value of the input

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Callback when the open state changes

subComponents.name: Option
subComponents.description: Individual selectable option within the combobox dropdown

props.name: value
props.description: The unique value for this option

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disable this option

props.name: children
props.description: The content to display for this option

subComponents.name: OptionGroup
subComponents.description: Groups related options together with an optional label

props.name: label
props.description: Label for this group of options

props.name: children
props.description: Option components in this group

props.name: children
props.description: Option and OptionGroup components
